name: KING OF MACHINES
description:
King of Machines is a mecha-themed side-scrolling beat 'em up, in a world where powered exo-suits are commonplace, and also the weapon of choice in a violent uprising.

Inspired by classic beat 'em ups like TMNT and Armored Warriors, as well as modern character action games.

Features:

  • Agile movement controls, a bit like Turtles in Time
  • Combo system with sweeps, uppercuts, and shotgun-kata
  • Grabbing & throwing, also a bit like Turtles in Time
  • Unlockable special weapons
  • Unique bosses
  • Training mode (with punching bag - use this to figure out all the possible combo attacks!)
  • Arrange mode
  • Cutscenes with anime references and gratuitous Engrish

For Xbox Controllers:

  • Move: D-Pad
  • Shoot: X
  • Melee: B
  • Jump: A
  • Special Weapons: L/R
  • BREAK Charge: Right Trigger
  • Pause: Start

Updated Combo List:

  • Launch: UP + MELEE
  • Dash: LEFT/RIGHT + JUMP
  • Guns Akimbo: LEFT + RIGHT + SHOOT
  • Giga Drill: MELEE, MELEE, FORWARD + MELEE
  • Uppercut: MELEE, MELEE, UP + MELEE
  • Sweep: MELEE, MELEE, DOWN + MELEE
  • Shotgun: MELEE MELEE, BACK + MELEE
  • Dive Kick: JUMP, MELEE
  • Giga Drill (Midair): JUMP, DOWN + MELEE
  • Shotgun (Midair): JUMP, SHOOT
  • Shoulder Gun: SHOOT (with full BREAK meter)

(All non-midair combos can be cancelled into Special Weapon attacks)
